Contributor: United States. War Loan Organization, publisher.;
Note: Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to buy thrift stamps and war savings stamps at the post offices, banks and many stores. Illustration shows a small portrait of Benjamin Franklin against a grey background.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Buy thrift stamps
